subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz hit a two-run homer in the ninth inning, barely clearing the low right-field wall, and lifted the host Boston Red Sox over the Tampa Bay Devil Rays, 5-4, last night.
snippet: David Ortiz hit a two-run homer in the ninth inning, barely clearing the low right-field wall, and lifted the host Boston Red Sox over the Tampa Bay Devil Rays, 5-4, last night.
